testcase.name: Ensure each container image has a pinned (tag) version

failure.message: Incorrect value for key `image` - specify an image version to avoid unpleasant "version surprises" in the future

testcase.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory request
Ensure each container has a configured CPU request
Ensure each container has a configured memory limit

failure.message: Missing property object `limits.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization

testcase.name: Ensure each container has a configured CPU limit
Prevent Ingress from forwarding all traffic to a single container
Prevent Service from exposing node port
Ensure CronJob scheduler is valid
Ensure workload has valid label values

failure.message: Incorrect value for key(s) under `labels` - the vales syntax is not valid so the Kubernetes engine will not accept it

testcase.name: Ensure deployment-like resource is using a valid restart policy
Ensure each container has a configured liveness probe

failure.message: Missing property object `livenessProbe` - add a properly configured livenessProbe to catch possible deadlocks

testcase.name: Ensure each container has a configured readiness probe
Ensure HPA has minimum replicas configured
Prevent workload from using the default namespace
Ensure Deployment has more than one replica configured
Ensure CronJob has a configured deadline
Prevent deprecated APIs in Kubernetes v1.16
Prevent deprecated APIs in Kubernetes v1.17
Prevent containers from having root access capabilities
Prevent CronJob from executing jobs concurrently
